Common.Highlight.Common.Text: Edgebrook is a 125,000 SF upscale shopping center located at the northeast corner of N. Alpine and Highcrest Roads in Rockford’s desirable northeast quadrant
Available spaces: 563 SF-12,400 SF
Located on signalized corner, with signalized access point from N. Alpine Rd. plus several additional non-signalized entry points around the center.
Established, well-known shopping center with maintenance and management on site.
Outstanding mix of retailers, offering an upscale, complimentary variety of goods and services.
A five-story, 38,000 SF office building provides a centerpiece that generates cross traffic for Edgebrook’s retail and restaurant establishments.
Beautiful, mature landscaping and attractive architectural touches add to the center’s ambiance.
Edgebrook promotes stores and center events with joint advertising and marketing programs.
Tenants include Ace Hardware, Anytime Fitness, Dunkin Donuts, Mary’s Market, Fleet Feet Sports, Baker Street Burgers, Manpower, Postal Shoppe, Lucha Cantina
Retail and Office spaces available

Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text:
Located on signalized corner, with signalized access point from N.
Alpine Rd. plus several additional non-signalized entry points around
the center.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: Edgebrook is a 125,000 SF upscale shopping center located at the northeast corner of N. Alpine and Highcrest Roads in Rockford’s desirable northeast quadrant

Common.Strapline.Common.Text: Edgebrook offers a unique blend of eclectic boutique shops, excellent restaurants, and convenient service oriented businesses. Where there is truly something for everyone.
